org.apache.pivot.wtk
Interface RollupStateListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
RollupSkin, RollupStateListener.Adapter, TerraRollupSkin
public interface RollupStateListener

Defines event listener methods that pertain to rollup state. Developers register for such events by adding themselves to a rollup's list of "rollup state listeners" (see Rollup.getRollupStateListeners()).

Nested Class Summary
static class RollupStateListener.Adapter
          Rollup state listener adapter.
